definition: Toyota or Toyoda (name)/Toyota, Japanese car make

sentences.english: Toyota has made it clear that although it was paying the fine, it was not admitting to any wrongdoing.
sentences.chinese: 豐田雖然已繳款，但拒不承認有過失。

sentences.english: But Kingston says Toyota must go further than that.
sentences.chinese: 但Kingston說豐田應該比這做得更多。

sentences.english: 'There was a period we became too profit oriented, ' he said. Mr.
sentences.chinese: 他說，曾有一段時間豐田變得過於以利潤爲導向。

sentences.english: Ono Jinai, the first one of the founders of the Toyota production methods.
sentences.chinese: 大野耐一是豐田生產方式的創始人之一。

sentences.english: I just bought a new Toyota Camry for $19,000.
sentences.chinese: 我剛剛花一萬九千美元買了輛豐田佳美車。

sentences.english: Toyota’s innovative efforts – including cleverer hybrids –will also be redoubled.
sentences.chinese: 豐田的革新努力措施，包括混合動力車，也將被加強。

sentences.english: Shoichiro Toyoda says he doesn't recall the meeting.
sentences.chinese: 豐田章一郎表示他記不起來這次會議了。

sentences.english: I think one advantage we might have with the Toyota engine is driveability.
sentences.chinese: 我覺得使用豐田引擎的一個優勢就是它們的性能。

sentences.english: A Ford or a Renault can be apet. A Toyota is always an appliance.
sentences.chinese: 福特或者雷諾車可以作爲寵物，豐田車則永遠是工具。

sentences.english: I tried my best to get some points for Toyota.
sentences.chinese: 我竭盡全力想爲豐田車隊掙得一些分數。

sentences.english: Toyota’s assembly plants reopened after being shut down for just two days.
sentences.chinese: 關門僅僅兩天之後豐田的組裝線就重新開動了。

sentences.english: The popular Toyota Prius, for example, is not yet manufactured in the United States.
sentences.chinese: 例如，熱銷的豐田普拉斯還未在美國投產。

sentences.english: Hm. I'd like a Toyota, then.
sentences.chinese: 嗯，那麼我要一輛豐田車。

sentences.english: Credit rating agencies are also keeping an eye on Toyota's brand image.
sentences.chinese: 信用評級機構也在密切關注豐田的品牌形象。

sentences.english: The Toyota Prius is the best-selling model.
sentences.chinese: 豐田的普銳斯是其中最受青睞的車型。

sentences.english: GM’s vehicles sell for between $3,000 and $10,000 less than Toyotas of the same size.
sentences.chinese: 同型號的車，通用比豐田少賣3000輛到1萬輛。

definition: Taiwan equivalent of 奔馳|奔驰[Ben1 chi2]
Nissan, Japanese car make/also transliterated 尼桑
one's own car (or motorbike)/vehicle for one's private use
(bus, train etc) depot/car factory or repair shop
supercar/abbr. to 超跑|超跑[chao1 pao3]
football played with oval-shaped ball (rugby, American football, Australian rules etc)
